subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Women)
Basketball (College)
Women and Girls
Alzheimer's Disease
lead_paragraph: Pat Summitt, the Tennessee women’s basketball coach, insisted that this bittersweet season be focused on her team rather than her early symptoms of Alzheimer’s disease.
snippet: Pat Summitt, the Tennessee women’s basketball coach, insisted that this bittersweet season be focused on her team rather than her early symptoms of Alzheimer’s disease.
